name: The Seal of Leviathan
description:
After a thousand years, the Seal originally created by the twelve kings is breaking. With the kingdoms in disarray and shadows lurking around every corner, it is up to the hero to become the legend and stop the minions of Leviathan from freeing their master.

List of Features:

  • Mixed Reality Game-play
  • 3D models
  • Card-Based Game-play
  • Turn-Based Combat

Players will need to download the app to their Android phone and allow access to the camera.

To load in the player model, the player will need to download and print the "GoblinMage" image. The game was design with "cards" in mind, but the larger the image size, the larger the models so any size works.
